whoweare.title: Who we are
description: We are a group of students of the 5CIA of the ITIS J.F. Kennedy in Pordenone who decided to rent a server.
We made this decision mainly for having a private server of our favourite videogames,
but then we implemented a series of awesome services (like the forum, the mail server, ecc...).

description.header: You don't have to do nothing particularly complicated to join us, you just have to:
points: Agree to The Entropics official regulation
Be accepted by the other members
Pay a monthly fee which is calculated based on the current number of members
